member.name: M:GoogleChartSharp.ShapeMarker.#ctor(GoogleChartSharp.ShapeMarkerType,System.String,System.Int32,System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a shape marker for points on line charts and scatter plots
member.param: the index of the line on which to draw the marker. This is 0 for the first data set, 1 for the second and so on

a floating point value that specifies on which data point the marker will be drawn. This is 1 for the first data set, 2 for the second and so on. Specify a fraction to interpolate a marker between two points.
the size of the marker in pixels

member.name: P:GoogleChartSharp.ShapeMarker.HexColor
member.summary: an RRGGBB format hexadecimal number.

member.name: P:GoogleChartSharp.ShapeMarker.DatasetIndex
member.summary: the index of the line on which to draw the marker. This is 0 for the first data set, 1 for the second and so on

member.name: P:GoogleChartSharp.ShapeMarker.DataPoint
member.summary: a floating point value that specifies on which data point the marker will be drawn. This is 1 for the first data set, 2 for the second and so on. Specify a fraction to interpolate a marker between two points

member.name: P:GoogleChartSharp.ShapeMarker.Size
member.summary: the size of the marker in pixels

member.name: F:GoogleChartSharp.ShapeMarkerType.Arrow
member.summary: A marker in the shape of an arrow

member.name: F:GoogleChartSharp.ShapeMarkerType.Cross
member.summary: A marker in the shape of a cross

member.name: F:GoogleChartSharp.ShapeMarkerType.Diamond
member.summary: A marker in the shape of a diamond

member.summary: A marker in the shape of a circle

member.name: F:GoogleChartSharp.ShapeMarkerType.Square
member.summary: A marker in the shape of a square

member.name: F:GoogleChartSharp.ShapeMarkerType.VerticalLineToDataPoint
member.summary: A marker that is a vertical line from the x-axis to the data point

member.name: F:GoogleChartSharp.ShapeMarkerType.VerticalLine
member.summary: A marker that is a vertical line from the x-axis to the top of the chart area through the data point

member.name: F:GoogleChartSharp.ShapeMarkerType.HorizontalLine
member.summary: A marker that is a horizontal line from the y-axis to the edge of the chart area through the data point

member.name: F:GoogleChartSharp.ShapeMarkerType.XShape
member.summary: A marker in the shape of an X

member.name: M:GoogleChartSharp.RangeMarker.#ctor(GoogleChartSharp.RangeMarkerType,System.String,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Create a range marker for line charts and scatter plots
member.param: Must be between 0.0 and 1.0. 0.0 is axis start, 1.0 is axis end.
Must be between 0.0 and 1.0. 0.0 is axis start, 1.0 is axis end.

member.name: P:GoogleChartSharp.RangeMarker.Color
member.summary: an RRGGBB format hexadecimal number.

member.name: P:GoogleChartSharp.RangeMarker.StartPoint
member.summary: for horizontal range markers is the position on the y-axis at which the range starts where 0.00 is the bottom and 1.00 is the top. for vertical range markers is the position on the x-axis at which the range starts where 0.00 is the left and 1.00 is the right.

member.name: P:GoogleChartSharp.RangeMarker.EndPoint
member.summary: for horizontal range markers is the position on the y-axis at which the range ends where 0.00 is the bottom and 1.00 is the top. for vertical range markers is the position on the x-axis at which the range ends where 0.00 is the left and 1.00 is the right.

member.name: F:GoogleChartSharp.RangeMarkerType.Horizontal
member.summary: A horizontal band across the chart area

member.name: F:GoogleChartSharp.RangeMarkerType.Vertical
member.summary: A vertical band across the chart area

member.name: T:GoogleChartSharp.FillArea
member.summary: Fill the area between / under lines

member.name: M:GoogleChartSharp.FillArea.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a fill area between lines for use on a line chart.
member.param: line indexes are determined by the order in which datasets are added. The first set is index 0, then index 1 etc
line indexes are determined by the order in which datasets are added. The first set is index 0, then index 1 etc

member.name: M:GoogleChartSharp.FillArea.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fill all the area under a line
member.param: line indexes are determined by the order in which datasets are added. The first set is index 0, then index 1 etc

member.name: P:GoogleChartSharp.FillArea.Color
member.summary: an RRGGBB format hexadecimal number

member.name: P:GoogleChartSharp.FillArea.StartLineIndex
member.summary: the index of the line at which the fill starts. This is determined by the order in which data sets are added. The first data set specified has an index of zero (0), the second 1, and so on.

member.name: P:GoogleChartSharp.FillArea.EndLineIndex
member.summary: the index of the line at which the fill ends. This is determined by the order in which data sets are added. The first data set specified has an index of zero (0), the second 1, and so on.

member.name: T:GoogleChartSharp.FillAreaType
member.summary: Specify area fill behavior

member.name: F:GoogleChartSharp.FillAreaType.SingleLine
member.summary: All area under the line will be filled

member.name: F:GoogleChartSharp.FillAreaType.MultiLine
member.summary: The area between this line and the next will be filled

member.summary: Specifies how the line chart handles datasets

member.name: F:GoogleChartSharp.LineChartType.SingleDataSet
member.summary: One line per dataset, points are evenly spaced along the x-axis

member.name: F:GoogleChartSharp.LineChartType.MultiDataSet
member.summary: Two datasets per line. The first dataset is the x coordinates of the line. The second dataset is the Y coordinates of the line.

member.param: specifies how the chart handles datasets
